column4: can someone help me fix my system. I've messed it up trying to apt-get php 5.2.4 from dotdeb. I need someone to walk me thru to restore my system so that I have the basic LAMP server working..
Not sure what your problem is but you can try apt-get -f install
-f gives the same results as the pastebin http://pastebin.com/m38314526
